com.wingfoot.soap.transport
Interface Transport

All Known Implementing Classes:
J2SEHTTPTransport
public interface Transport

Interface for all the transport implementations. Users desiring to implement their own transport have to implement this interface.

Since:
0.90

Method Detail

call

public byte[] call(byte[] payload)
            throws SOAPException,
                   java.io.IOException
Method to open a connection to a server and send the payload. Returns a byte stream representing the response from the server.
Parameters:
payload - the SOAP message as a byte array.
Returns:
an array of bytes representing the response; null if no response is returned. throws IOException if any error occurs while connecting to the server. throws SOAPException if response is not XML.

setEndpoint

public void setEndpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
Method to set the endpoint url. The endpoint url is where the particular service resides.
Parameters:
endpoint - String representation of the endpoint
Returns:
void

setSOAPAction

public void setSOAPAction(java.lang.String SOAPAction)
Method to set the SOAPAction.
Parameters:
soapAction - String representation of the SOAPAction

Method to get the endpoint url
